name: ToothStars
description:
ToothStars

Hello everybody!

ToothStars is an educational oral hygiene game for kids between 6 and 12. Developed together with experts and professionals in the field of juvenile dental medicine, its goal is to help children acquire fundamental skills and knowledge about their teeth. Through these games, they'll learn how to take care of their teeth, boost their oral hygiene, and learn about healthy foods – all while having fun!

ToothStars strives to help your children

  • Practice better oral hygiene
  • Take proper care of their teeth
  • Recognize foods that are good for their health

Have fun playing and don't forget to brush your teeth!
